resources.string:
Hi, my name is João, also Jon :D. 

I love videogames. 

Kind of addicted to it, but not so much. 
Fun fact is that I have only one physical game and it's my favorite Dark Souls 2. 

I am vegetarian since two years, 
And is very funny to discover new foods that I always denied like the famous Broccoli. 

I love to play sports, like Swimming, Running, Cycling and Bodybuilding too :) 
I think, though.
